about_the_game:
ADVENTURE AWAITS BEYOND THE SEA!


TORRENTS OF THE SPELLHOARDER IS ADAPTED FROM THE 500-PAGE LONG 5E ADVENTURE MODULE AND A CAMPAIGN SETTING. UNCOVER INTRIGUE AND MYSTERY IN THIS SEAFARING, OCEAN-DIVING CAMPAIGN RUNNING FROM 16TH TO 20TH LEVEL!


Discover the new monsters, encounter maps, subclasses, feats, spells, and magic items, all of which are included in the module.


Torrents of the Spellhoarder is a direct sequel to our previous adventure, Crown of the Oathbreaker, which takes characters from level 1 to 16th. Both books stand on their own and can be played either separately, or one after another to create a truly epic adventure.


The realm of Xantharos and the Calhay Sea is full of dragons, pirates, and formidable armies of darkness! Intrigue, mystery, and legendary loot await those who brave the challenges in this comprehensive Virtual Tabletop (VTT) package.


Running the campaign is a breeze with the hand-drawn maps featuring line of sight, lighting, and special effects--all preconfigured for smooth and satisfying gameplay. Tokens, stat blocks, and portraits for every NPC and monster await your deployment, ensuring an immersive experience.


Board the Stated Contessa, a ship headed to the legendary Isles of Xantharos, and uncover the mystery of a murdered merchant. But beware--the sea is full of monsters, and the rumors about the return of an ancient kraken necromancer might prove more than just tall tales told by grumpy sailors. Unveil the mysteries of the eight orbs of magic and liberate the deep-sea elven city of A’rvanshy and the slaves of the Isles of Xantharos.


Your purchase includes the following digital products and content:

Torrents of the Spellhoarder FGVTT Module (Containing all Torrents of the Spellhoarder content)


2 LARGE SANDBOX MAPS

20+ DUNGEON MAPS AND 6 BATTLE MAPS

80+ ILLUSTRATED NPCS

20 NEW MAGIC ITEMS

55 NEW MONSTERS AND TEMPLATES

24 NEW SUBCLASSES

22 NEW SPELLS AND FEATS
